description:
Midjourney has announced the alpha release of its V7 image generation model for testing by the AI community. The new model packs improvements in text prompt understanding, image quality, and feature coherence. “V7 is an amazing model. It’s much smarter with text prompts, image prompts look fantastic, image quality is noticeably higher with beautiful textures, […]

The post Midjourney V7: Faster AI image generation appeared first on AI News.
title: Midjourney V7: Faster AI image generation

description:
Google has recently released an AI-powered update to Gmail’s search functionality. The update sees the email app move away from the chronological display of search results to a new relevance-based ordering of results. The built-in AI engine analyses emails based on factors like recency, most-clicked emails, and frequent contacts, to display conversations users are likely […]

The post AWISEE.com Analyzes Gmail’s AI-Powered Search Update and Its Impact on Influencer Marketing appeared first on AI News.
title: AWISEE.com Analyzes Gmail’s AI-Powered Search Update and Its Impact on Influencer Marketing
